attributes.additional_details: Animal torture hidden online world of pet sex abuse.internet community of thousands of British perverts arrange to meet for sex with each other's pets.twisted websites which can be easily found using search engines.Allow animal abusers to discuss their preferences before arranging to meet for sexual encounters with helpless animals.the sun recently done a investigation this is barbaric cruel and disgusting and no pet should have to suffer this abuse please help stop it by sighning and sharing the petition thank you .
